name: Kinematic (Early Development)
description:
Kinematic is a Metroidvania with a significant focus on Rube Goldberg-esque factory-building. As you navigate the world, you discover new recipes that you can incorporate into your ever-growing factory. It's in a from-scratch C++ engine, using GLFW and Vulkan. Targeting release in 2021.

Devblog: https://kinematicgame.com

Playtest survey: https://forms.gle/RN33EWg8fDbrZqC59

Known issue: If your keybindings become unusable or undesirable, you can delete SaveData/Profile1/KeyMappings.json and restart the game. Any progress in game will be saved, and a force-rebinding will occur.
